name: NSNib
desc: An object wrapper, or container, for an Interface Builder nib file.

items.name: init?(nibNamed: NSNib.Name, bundle: Bundle?)
items.desc: Returns an NSNib object initialized to the nib file in the specified bundle.

items.name: init(nibData: Data, bundle: Bundle?)
items.desc: Initializes an instance with nib data and specified bundle for locating resources.

items.name: func instantiate(withOwner: Any?, topLevelObjects: AutoreleasingUnsafeMutablePointer<NSArray?>?) -> Bool
items.desc: Instantiates objects in the nib file with the specified owner.
